Personally, I think "fish," but I understand that this is a controversial opinion to hold on the matter.

There's no option for saying that cheating cheats cheating cheating is cheating? Wow.

Oh, and I'll just leave this here:

I consider making a thread about what's cheating is cheating and making a thread about what's cheating is cheating is also cheating. Conversely, not making a thread about not what's cheating is cheating is indeed cheating, as is implying a cheating thread about cheating is about cheating is cheating. Furthermore, making a post about what's cheating is cheating is also cheating is cheating, which is cheating. The way this can be prevented is by subtracting the amount of cheating from the amount of cheats and multiplying it by the "cheating about cheating is cheating" value and adjusting the "is cheating cheaters in cheats cheating also cheating cheaters cheating?" cheating level by that amount, but this might be cheating.

What you forget is that chatting about cheating is clearly cheating chatting between cheating chatters. Cheating chatters chatter on about cheats, while cheating cheaters cheat at chats. When it's cold enough and raining it's sleeting on cheating chatters' cheating chats, and the sleet stops the flight of bats.

No. Because two words: Random Overheats.

I've said it before and I'll say it again.... It's a singleplayer sandbox game with heavy support for modding. Nothing you can do would be considered cheating as there's nothing to cheat except for your expectations.

Basically if you're having fun you're not cheating.*

*Unless you're (a) playing on a multiplayer server and what you're doing goes against the server's rules or ( you're doing some sort of forum/reddit challenge and what you're doing goes against the rules of that challenge.

I've said it before and I'll say it again.... It's a singleplayer sandbox game with heavy support for modding. Nothing you can do would be considered cheating as there's nothing to cheat except for your expectations.

Basically if you're having fun you're not cheating.*

*Unless you're (a) playing on a multiplayer server and what you're doing goes against the server's rules or ( you're doing some sort of forum/reddit challenge and what you're doing goes against the rules of that challenge.

You appear to be taking this seriously. Now, vegetables are a serious matter, but cheating in single player games sure isn't. For example, why is cabbage looked down upon so much? Sure, red cabbage gets some love, but green cabbage is relegated to an existence of being seen as a vegetable for the lower classes. Yet it's got more flavor than a lot of the fancy lettuces! It has a nice tang to it. This discrimination against cabbages is systemic and serves to demonstrate the prejudices against the poor inherent in the system. Likewise for turnips vs potatoes. Throw off the oppressive regime of historical prejudice! Eat more cabbage and turnips!

This is the funniest thread I've visited in a long time. Any mods around, please don't lock this.

Unless of course it devolves into something stupid, but for now this is a very important thread.

But in all seriousness, alt-F12 is cheating that doesn't matter. It's just the way you want to play the game, and also there's the fact that it's not multiplayer, so cheating is not being used as a way to unfairly get ahead of the competition (THERE IS NONE!!!!).caps again
Why are you using a poll? You notorious cheater.
Obviously, I'd likely pick "vegetables," but OP failed to define how realistic they would be, so I need to withhold judgement.
